text: The Driver & Vehicle Agency (DVA), also known as Driver and Vehicle Licensing Northern Ireland (DVLNI) is the organisation that holds the registers of drivers and vehicles for Northern Ireland. The DVA head office is in Coleraine in Northern Ireland. They are an agency of the Northern Ireland government. ==Related pages== * Driver & Vehicle Licensing Agency, the agency for Great Britain (the other part of the United Kingdom). ==References== Category:Government agencies of the United Kingdom Category:Transport in Northern Ireland Category:Organisations based in Northern Ireland
title: Driver and Vehicle Agency
